description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 15 format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. The &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d12 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The nergaliid magically draws the life from a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} it can see within 40 feet of it. The target must make a [[/save wis 15 format=long]]. An &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} target fails the save automatically. On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage 3d6 type=psychic average=true]] damage, and the nergaliid gains temporary hit points equal to the damage taken. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the nergaliid doesn’t gain temporary hit points. If this damage kills the target, its body rises at the end of the nergaliid’s current turn as a husk zombie (see earlier in this chapter).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Shadow &Reference[ste]{Stealth}. While in dim light or darkness, the nergaliid can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Standing Leap. The nergaliid’s long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
